Type.BattleDialog: Don’t get too nervous, we’re pressing forward.
Cover me from behind. I’ll go ahead.
I won’t miss… I’ll chase you down swiftly.
Even if we win, will he let us go… I have no idea what the Blue Reverberation is up to.
A rightful victory. Is everyone alright?
It seems I was the one who was made light of…
Not yet… I don’t want to fall yet!
…What’s going to happen now?
Stay vigilant! This isn’t over yet.
Is this… where we must stop?
They’re amateurs. Didn’t even have to predict.
Target confirmed eliminated. Moving on to the next.
Sense can make all the difference.
Don’t worry, and focus on the battle. I’ll take care of ‘em.
We’re already here, things will work out somewhat, right?
It’s good to be careful, but you shouldn’t hesitate when you take the shot.
Thought you could stop us with that little firepower?
A gun like this can be useful in the right situation.
Don’t be ridiculous! I’m not finished yet…
I can’t hold out anymore… Sorry.
…This sucks. I didn’t want us to get into this mess.
If only I sniped more carefully…
We can’t let our formation break…
We’re progressing smoothly. Let’s keep focus.
That was a clean finisher.
You only have your own skills to blame.
Here goes another frightful fight…
What are we taking this stupid adventure for?
I’m almost out of ammo, too… There’s no way we can win.
That was a nail-biting experience. Should I be glad that we won…
Aren’t we still gonna be greeted by the Blue Reverb when we get back?
Not fair… I didn’t come here because I wanted to!
That damned blue asshole screwed us all up…!
I’m not sure if we can hold out anymore… You sure we should keep this up?
My mind is about to break. Let’s just call it quits.
Dammit… Let me out of this insanity.
You should’ve been more careful.
There’s only a few of ‘em left, right…? Please say so…
I don’t wanna stay here any longer.
